lenders.name: Christian Riesen

lenders.name: Jasper

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: I loan cause I strongly believe in micro credits as a good solution to support people.

lenders.loan_because: We believe in people being given a chance to start their own enterprise

lenders.occupational_info: building the systems behind big websites

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do..

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: My brother gave me a gift certificate, and said that this is a very cool site.  I agree.  I think it's neat to meet people from all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly open incoming mail and scan invoices.  Document imaging, trying to make the invoicing process as paperless as possible.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do and I always do the least I can do.  Actually, I'm very grateful that someone has made it so easy to participate in micro-lending. (UUFF Fredericksburg, VA)
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to help themselves

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people. I want to learn about people outside the USA.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school to learn.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: not giving back is a poor choice
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand their medications.

lenders.name: Jedidiah
lenders.loan_because:
Life is about helping others - and helping others to help themselves - and helping others to help yet others. By material standards, I am in NO way a wealthy person. I was quite surprised when Kiva informed me that I am in the top 1% of Kiva lenders. It was not my goal to become a top-level lender. My goal was – and is – simply to continue to help others. 
One way of helping is by making more interest-free loans as current loans are paid back to me or as other resources become available to me to make more interest-free loans. I'd like to be able to start each and every day by making another Kiva loan.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to continually look for ways and means to help people - and to help them.

lenders.name: Delise
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best idea in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites easier for people to use.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English at a university to students whose first language is not English.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: This is a very feasible way for me to give and make it a cycle!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mom and law student expected to graduate 2012.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of animal hearts :)

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people meet their dreams. Sustainability and independence is a great way to build peace.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I loan out of gratitude to all the people who helped me when I worked in the corporate world, and who later helped me start my own very small (one-person) business.  In a sense, I loan to repay a debt that I can never truly repay to all those who helped me get my start.   I plan to reinvest any repaid loans into new loans, so by repaying your loan you are also "paying forward" to someone else who is also looking to work hard to improve the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage and test new computer programs that researchers use to invent new drugs and medical devices.  I feel very fortunate: I love my work!

lenders.name: Trevor & Alva
lenders.loan_because: we all  need to help each other especially to people poorer than ourselves
lenders.occupational_info: we are retired but spend a lot of time helping the poor and needy through St Vincent de Paul

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupation: Collegiate Minister and Non Profit Professional
lenders.loan_because: Jesus cares for our relational and physical needs.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I do not have a lot of money and I have a desire to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying economics at a school in Rexburg, Idaho, United States.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because:
It helps everyone, even those not directly involved.A group effort by a bunch of strangers who otherwise would never cross paths.
What's not to like?

lenders.name: Greg and the Gob5ive
lenders.loan_because: We love the entire process. Reading the individual stories of entrepreneurs, chosing the projects we like most, getting updates from borrowers. Then see our money come back, and send it for another round of good deeds.
lenders.occupational_info: I design video games. I define the rules of the game, story and characters. I work with engineers and artists to develop the games people will play on their consoles.

lenders.name: Sjoerd
lenders.loan_because: Giving people a start can change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling IT related business

lenders.name: Tim Lynn Jillian
lenders.loan_because: It is easy for me and means so much to you
lenders.occupational_info: I am on a team that sells telecommunications solutions to big business

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the American dream of success through hard work and innovation, and I wish to give other the opportunity to have a good life. Everyone deserves a chance at success, and I'd like to help people where I can do exactly that.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I am working to put myself through college so I can make a better life for myself. I'm currently seeking a degree in Management of Information Systems. It is hard work, but nothing worth while in life comes free or easy.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.occupational_info: I run websites, and help promote other people's.

lenders.name: Mats Bleikelia
lenders.loan_because: In a society of little economic development, universal inactivity accompanies universal poverty. You survive not by struggling against nature, or by increasing production, or by relentless labor; instead you survive by expending as little energy as possible, by striving constantly to achieve a state of immobility. (Ryszard Kapuscinski)

lenders.name: Dorothea
lenders.loan_because: I believe very much in Gandhi's "Be the change you want to see in the world"; Kiva is a great way of making a positive difference to someone's life.

lenders.name: Byron
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: kaliman
lenders.loan_because: everybody who can afford it should do it
lenders.occupational_info: sitting in front of a computer and trying to make processes in large companies more efficient

lenders.name: Denis
lenders.loan_because: If I can offer some little help to unfortunates then thank God I can do that.

lenders.name: Nanthi & Ramesh
lenders.loan_because: hard work should be rewarded.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small college in the United States.

lenders.whereabouts: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Las Palmas
lenders.loan_because: Somos una empresa social con responsabilidades sociales.
lenders.occupational_info: Nos dedicamos al desarrollo de software a medida, entre otras cosas.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make their lives better. Loans given to help support an entrepreneur can make a positive impact on a whole community!

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: ...it is a shame to see poor, desperate people on TV who work only for paying the interests of their credits. There is a good reason for nearly all world religions to prohibit lending money for interests...

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Helping people feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a glorified bookkeeper.

lenders.name: Fábio
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people's efforts to make this world a better one.
lenders.occupational_info: I study and I am currently performing scientific investigation on the area of computer science.

lenders.name: Mira & David
lenders.loan_because: more people will have a chance to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mira's work is taking care of financial transactions. She likes the company and the people and is happy, even if it is not an important job. David works ad-interim, making deals for companies, often for large amounts. Still the work has become less interesting because it is increasingly becoming a desk job. The paperwork/administration has grown and the company-visits and negotiations have decreased. 

We hope to find some fulfillment in aiding others who are really producing for primary needs, and that we can help in this way.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a cancer research lab as a secretary.

lenders.name: Adam and Lauren
lenders.loan_because: Adam and Lauren are two very  wonderful individuals that care about world issues.  And as we all know: Sharing is Caring!!

lenders.name: hannah
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently on my way to teach and work with refugees in northern Thailand.

lenders.name: S Figar
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at times. Lending enables people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in what they want to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to sell yarn and teach knitting. I am retired now.

lenders.name: Felix Mohr
lenders.loan_because: Change is gonna come - now...

lenders.name: QuantiView
lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we know a little investment can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info:
We count what we view.  Using a combination of hardware, software, and human skill, we turn images and video into tabular data and insights. 

A good analogy is sports statistics. Someone, somewhere, is watching sports action and counting "goals", "touchdowns", "home runs", etc. Each measure was originally envisioned and defined by someone, and has specific and detailed criteria. We apply the same principles to measure everyday life.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: People, especially women and children, need it. I want these women and children to have the same advantages that I do. And I hope once they prosper, each "Pays it forward," in their own community.

lenders.name: Drauzio
lenders.loan_because: Um abraço - Drauzio Milagres - Entre no Blogger - O Mundo no Seu Dia-a-Dia - E faça seus comentários - http://drauziomilagres.blogspot.com
lenders.occupational_info: Um abraço - Drauzio Milagres - Entre no Blogger - O Mundo no Seu Dia-a-Dia - E faça seus comentários - http://drauziomilagres.blogspot.com

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because:
To defy this capitalist system that seems falling down, where banks that earn millions don't give credit to this people.
Para desafiar a este sistema capitalista que parece en ruinas, donde bancos con miles de millones en beneficios no dan crédito a estas personas.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for NGOs as a consultant, helping them to improve their performance.
Trabajo para ONGs como consultor, ayudándoles a mejorar su trabajo

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to give something back. I have been running my own business for 4 years at time of writing and I know how hard it is to get support when you are starting up.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a web design company. We are based in Bromsgrove, Worcestershire in the UK. We create websites for small and medium-sized businesses.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people success.

lenders.name: Paul and Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Maren
lenders.loan_because: it is a respectful way of helping people.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: Givers Gain and Takers Lose, What You Put Out Comes Back.
lenders.occupational_info: Webmaster for major companies and small business owners

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because: I believe even a small gesture can make a big impact.
lenders.occupational_info: My son is my joy and purpose in life.  I am also taking courses in environmental restoration, my second joy.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: our group of self employed women want to help other self employed women create or expand thier business
lenders.occupational_info: I take photographs of babies, childen, wedding and other events.

lenders.name: David R.
lenders.loan_because: After 15+ years in another business I got tired of being "part of the problem" and wanted to be part of the solution. Then I remembered something I heard Jesse Jackson say during his first Presidential Campaign, "people need a hand-up, not a hand out!" I believe Kiva is devoted to that idea so here I am. I realized the better world I wanted to see doesn't begin with others, it begins with me. It begins at my keyboard, in my viewfinder, my lense and my heart.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a team of professional people to make films and documentaries.

lenders.name: Dave & JoAnn
lenders.loan_because: We have served in developing countries and know the benefits of this type of lending.
lenders.occupational_info: We are small business owners that clean carpeting, upholstery, tile and grout flooring and wood flooring.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: osteopathic medicine

lenders.name: federico
lenders.loan_because: is useful and equal
lenders.occupational_info: I instruct the pilot about their actions in the air

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a positive difference in the world.

lenders.name: Be Legendary
lenders.loan_because:
I am addicted to making a difference in the lives of others.  

Also, I believe in the power of entrepreneurship and small business.  It is the #1 way to bring communities above the poverty level.  So lending to small business around the world makes sense.  

Lastly, I dislike simply giving hand-outs, though I do that as well.  I like that the entrepreneurs are simply looking for some help to get their business going and repay the loan with their success.

Go Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info:
I help people discover their strengths and understand the basic framework for how to create a Legendary Life.  

I do this mostly through corporate work and creating Legendary Experiences so people can feel what it is like to Be Legendary.

lenders.name: Hongqing
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle that giving fishnet is better than giving fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a risk manager and portfolio strategist with 10+ years experience in the lending industry.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate that through Kiva people across the world are being empowered.  Thank you for letting me help.

lenders.name: OLS 327
lenders.loan_because: We are doing this as a class project on microloans and we believe in their cause and we as a group appreciate Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students taking a class about Global Leadership.

lenders.name: Corapi
lenders.loan_because: Teach kids about the world & in order to make a difference in individual lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Lou is a finance manager, Mia is a full-time Mom, the kids are starting school and having fun

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help to get off the ground in this world. I want to help those in return to all of those who have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to help and bless people. I want to bring them hope through Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Adriaan
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone deserves opportunities to make a better life for themselves.

kiva=loans=opportunity

lenders.name: Coral
lenders.loan_because: I like to be an active part in helping the less fortunate help themselves

lenders.loan_because: End-To-End is the New World Order! People helping People. Thanks Kiva for making it so easy. Times are tough, but I will add some money to the pool when I can.

lenders.loan_because: I feel better helping other people...
lenders.occupational_info: I do hardly any work for money that is prodigious for a resident of the World and satisfactory for a resident of United Kingdom...

lenders.name: Frankspeare
lenders.loan_because: I used to be poor. I know what it's like. I regret the way that capitalism and the US Government exploit the poor. I want to make a difference and make a personal contribution to this world being a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to do what I love, which is playing music, and I am blessed to be paid for it. I also work as a security guard to make sure that I can pay my bills.

lenders.occupation: Sales Excute for spray booth filters

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good and is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage small businesses and properties for clients.

lenders.name: Gar

lenders.loan_because: I can and I enjoy helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I love learning new things and foreign languages

lenders.name: Noni
lenders.loan_because: it feels great to connect with people around the world and to assist those who are motivated to better their living conditions. We adopted our daughter from Cali, Colombia in 1991 and I've been searching for other ways to connect in social service!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are committed to bettering their finances and health by connecting them with high impact nutrition and business opportunity. We work in teams to support each other's visions.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in karma, and the best karma is realized through helping those who want to help themselves and who end up helping others as a result of their efforts.  And so on and so on...  :)
lenders.occupational_info: I make jewelry and invest in real estate.

lenders.name: Sandiip
lenders.loan_because: "What people need is not charity but an opportunity"

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: sometimes good people need a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: My fiance and I are trying to save for our wedding on Oct 3, 2010 in Woodbury, NY at the Fox Hollow.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I love the Lord and He would do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a born-again Christian in love with Jesus and showing His love to anyone and everyone I can!

lenders.name: Rajesh
lenders.loan_because: i believe in hardwork and sincerity
lenders.occupational_info: i work every day to earn and to pay back what i have loaned , i invest in real estate and earn money .

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully to help someone change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been very fortunate to make a living doing something I enjoy. And, hopefully help others to get involved.

lenders.name: Zachery
lenders.loan_because: I support small businesses via my job every day via software, but here is a chance to have a more direct effect.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on financial software for small businesses, specifically the payroll for employees.

lenders.name: Heike
lenders.loan_because: I have (so far :-) been quite lucky in life and could/can afford a good life. I want to help others living under less lucky conditions by supporting them to build up a solid basis of their livelihood with their own hands and with a little help from their friends.

lenders.name: Neeraj
lenders.loan_because: Lot of genuine and hard working people across the world need that little help to lift themselves out of poverty and be self sustained.
lenders.occupational_info: Retailer of Wireless Products.

lenders.name: Amanda Peña
lenders.occupation: Student at the George Washington University
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Peru and learned how powerful micro-loans are and how a small amount of capital can fundamentally change the way a person earns his livelihood. I want to be able to give back, but as a student, I do not have the means to simply give. Kiva allows me the opportunity to make smart loans while inspiring entrepreneurship and helping people to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in seeing what someone will do given a decent chance.

lenders.name: Engrid
lenders.loan_because: I believe you have to help your  worldwide family.
lenders.occupational_info: I make gemstone beaded jewelry and sell at fairs and shows.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I find information for people.

lenders.name: JPH
lenders.loan_because: I can!  It's that simple.  Helping out when others are in need of assistance should be that simple :)
lenders.occupational_info: I run sales/marketing and a lot more for a computer networking equipment maker.

lenders.name: Mesa
lenders.loan_because: If everyone had the chance to peacefully and fairly provide for themselves and their families, this world would be a different place.

lenders.name: paulette
lenders.loan_because: it is satisfying for me to know that I am helping a deserving person to fillful an ambition or dream to better his or her life
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired stay at home wife.

lenders.name: Ellis Sirait
lenders.loan_because: I love giving...

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: You might not always be the big dog.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Motto:  You take what you need and give what you can.  People have helped me when I needed it, now i have a chance to give some back.
lenders.occupational_info: When I was able to work, I helped children to be able to talk better, and old people who had trouble being able to eat.  Now I am retired because I am disabled and can no longer work, but I am lucky enough to still have enough for a good life, so I feel good about sharing.

lenders.name: Anders
lenders.occupational_info: I work with production of renewable energy from organic wastes.

lenders.name: Fi Sproule
lenders.loan_because: its important to help out on a global scale as well as doing it locally.  We are all one earth family and its an honour to be able to do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on Aboriginal Community in the Tanami Desert in Australia. I am the youth worker here and I work with young people to give them a better understanding of the outside world and keep them seeking to keep their traditional way.  Its a wonderful job and I get to hang with the most wonderful young people

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference, no matter how small. Kiva gives us the opportunity to make a big impact with a small donation!

lenders.name: Cullen
lenders.loan_because: I for once feel that my little bit of help is truly having a big impact in the world.

lenders.name: Martina
lenders.loan_because:
Folks who can spare a cent - should! 
(Leute die einen Groschen entbehren koennen - sollten)

lenders.name: Marjorie
lenders.loan_because: We are all citizens of the same planet.
lenders.occupational_info: Learning about the world around us and how we fit into it.

lenders.name: Elies Campo
lenders.loan_because: With Kiva we can make huge positive impact all around the world.  My humble contribution to help people around the world improve their lives.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.occupational_info: I am a math and science teacher who works with students in grades seven and eight (11-14 year olds).  I love working with this age group- they're energetic, passionate, creative, and hilarious to be around!

lenders.name: Ella
lenders.loan_because: The world needs to become more interconnected and I love helping this come true. We are not one in a sea of many, we are one who has taken many forms.
lenders.occupational_info: I love learning.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because:
"No problem of human destiny is beyond human beings. Man's reason and spirit have often solved the seemingly unsolvable - and we believe they can do it again." 

John F. Kennedy
lenders.occupational_info: Health care quality improvement

lenders.name: Norriene
lenders.loan_because: Community Service is my love language. I get satisfaction from helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an International Accounting firm and my home office is Harrisburg, Pennsylvania in the USA.

lenders.name: Eve and Storm
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have a chance at their dreams.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: it is another way to pay it forward.  I like the concept, the fact that small loans can make a big difference, and that it is a way to help bring peace and security to other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the mental health department of heath care cooperative.

lenders.name: Chiqui
lenders.loan_because:
love people who strive to help themselves.

helping is another way of getting happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: Working at least 8 hours a day in front of a computer.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: God loves those who help others
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people find homes

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: I can't change the world but by making some of my money available to others, I hope to make someone's life a little bit easier, make some people a little bit happier, and spread goodwill.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the receptionist at a busy law firm in Florida, USA, where I handle phone calls, greet clients and visitors. During quiet moments I look out the 19th floor window towards the Atlantic ocean and think about the people I have met in faraway places during my annual month-long vacation.

lenders.loan_because: To bless others as I have been blessed
lenders.occupational_info: I talk on the telephone alot. I try to help the people I talk to.

lenders.occupational_info: We're both teachers.

lenders.name: Yoriko
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a happier world for everyone!

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because:
"To those who have been given much, much is asked of them."
I believe in giving a lending hand to those who are willing to put in the effort to make a better life for themselves, the lives of their family and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an experienced finance professional in all areas of finance including accounting, foreign exchange management, cash management, strategic planning, work process flow design, and internal auditing.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make life a little better for other women who are having a hard time of it,.  This is my way of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I do volunteer work withpeople who have cancer and who have 2 months or less to live.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: Supporting sustainable growth around the world is not only a moral mandate, it is the best possible investment in our collective future.
lenders.occupational_info: I create tools for technology pioneers around the world

lenders.name: Christmas Fund
lenders.loan_because: Our family wants to contribute together as a group. We wanted to become connected more with each other in a common endeavor and we wanted to become connected more broadly in our global community.
lenders.occupational_info: Dad works for an energy company, mom is a nurse, Patrick is a doctor, Natasha is a nurse and photographer, Jen is a student and mother of five, Sarah is an attorney and mother of two, Harry is an attorney, Daniel is a student and Suzie is a student.

lenders.occupational_info:
I promot services, businesses and products over the Internet. 

On the one hand, Internet marketing is a creative process (texts, images, ideas), on the other hand it has many technical aspects (coding and design). I also place media (i.e. banners and text-ads) on websites. 

Search engine marketing (SEM), search engine optimization (SEO), banner ads on specific websites, email marketing, and social media.
